channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description: When i try to do the compiler+run.bat for tele-scape it says i do not have the java files! and sometimes it says i dont got JDK 6.0 when i downloaded it already! please help me ;D

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

try useing this

@echo off
title Menu
cls
echo.
echo cr = compile and run
echo r = run
echo c = compile
echo.
set /p variable=Command:
if %variable%==cr goto cnr
if %variable%==c goto compiler
if %variable%==r goto run

:compiler
@echo off
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” *.java
pause
goto menu
:cnr
@echo off
title Compiler
cls
javac *.java
pause
goto run
:run
@echo off
cls
title Server Starter
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo - -
echo - starting Server -
echo - -
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
[/code]

Read full topic
